nodes.text: Their voodoo fantasies were safe in Crawford.

There was no one at the ranch to chastise them for bequeathing backbreaking budget deficits to generations yet unborn. And no one was there to confront them with evidence of the intense suffering that so many poor working-class and middle-class families are experiencing right now because of job losses on Mr. Bush's watch.

If there was no one there to chastise them for bequeathing backbreaking budget deficits and no one there to confront them with evidence of the suffering that so many working-class and middle-class families are experiencing now because of job losses their voodoo fantasies are safe in Crawford.
